articles.author: WHDH
articles.title: TJ MAXX opening new store in Massachusetts
articles.description: The Framingham-based retailer’s newest location is slated to open at the CambridgeSide shopping mall in Cambridge on April 14.

articles.author: WCVB
articles.title: Man hits, shoots, kills nephew outside Cambridge District Court, DA says
articles.description: MEDFORD, Mass. — Authorities say a man who was seeking an extension of a restraining order against his nephew struck him in a Massachusetts courthouse parking lot and then shot him multiple times.

articles.author: The Crimson
articles.title: City of Cambridge Eliminates Local Tax on Recreational Cannabis
articles.description: The Cambridge City Council unanimously passed a policy order repealing a three percent “Community Impact Fee” tax on recreational marijuana in a meeting Monday evening.
